Your telegram 11683, dated 27th August. Agapier\s information is generally confirmed as regards Afghanistan by reports from an absolutely reliable source. As regards Persia I should be glad to have your appreciation of situation, and I suggest that Malleson should visit Tehran to concert with Persian Government such defence as they may be capable of.
